fields.name: step_name
fields.label: Step name
fields.help:
[required] An human readable short name for the step.
E.g. K562_R1_RNA-seq_fastq.

fields.name: raw_data_type
fields.label: Technology
fields.help: The technology used to produce the raw data (e.g. RNA-seq).

fields.name: files_location
fields.label: Output files
fields.help: [required] The location for the generated raw data files.

fields.name: step_id
fields.label: Step ID
fields.help: Identify uniquely this step in the system [Autogenerated].

fields.name: submission_date
fields.label: Submission date
fields.help: [required] Date when the information was added.

fields.name: last_edition_date
fields.label: Last edition
fields.help: [required] The last time the information was edited.

fields.name: step_owners
fields.label: Owners
fields.help: [required] Only owners can edit the information of the step.

fields.name: analyticalReplicate_id
fields.label: Sample ID
fields.help: [required] The ID of the Analytical Sample used to obtain the Raw data.
